description.value: The biologicallyderivedproduct-intendedRecipient extension may be used to record the intended recipient of the BiologicallyDerivedProduct to satisfy product traceability requirements, and does not represent administration, nor does it prevent administration to a different recipient at a future date. Further detail on the traceability requirements can be found on the BiologicallyDerivedProduct resource [Intended Recipient](http://hl7.org/fhir/biologicallyderivedproduct.html#intendedrecipient) section.

short.value: The intended recipient of a directed or designated biologically derived product

definition.value: The biologicallyderivedproduct-intendedRecipient extension may be used to record the intended recipient of the BiologicallyDerivedProduct to satisfy product traceability requirements, and does not represent administration, nor does it prevent administration to a different recipient at a future date. Further detail on the traceability requirements can be found on the BiologicallyDerivedProduct resource [Intended Recipient](http://hl7.org/fhir/biologicallyderivedproduct.html#intendedrecipient) section.

comment.value: The biologicallyderivedproduct-intendedRecipient extension and BiologicallyDerivedProduct.collection.sourcePatient may contain references to identifiable patients. Implementers shall ensure the appropriate data access controls are established.
